original_text: And the glory of the Lord went up from the cherub to the threshold of the house, and the house was filled with the cloud, and the court was filled with the brightness of the glory of the Lord.
korean_text: 여호와의 영광이 그룹에서 올라와 성전 문지방에 이르니 구름이 성전에 가득하며 여호와의 영화로운 광채가 뜰에 가득하였고

sentences.original_text: And the glory of the Lord went up
from the cherub to the threshold of the house
and the house was filled with the cloud
and the court was filled with the brightness
of the glory of the Lord
